bike.description: Specialized E5 AEROTEC, fully manipulated aero tubing, compact Transition race design

components.description: Specialized FACT monocoque carbon aero fork, carbon legs, crown, and steerer, Speed Zertz
Specialized Mindset Plus Carbon, 1 1/8" integrated threadless, cartridge sealed bearings, alloy 20mm cone w/ one 10mm and two 5mm alloy spacers
Specialized Pro-Set lightweight stem, 3D forged alloy, 4-bolt 31.8mm bar clamp, 4- position adjustable
Specialized Zertz Transition bullhorn bars, 31.8 clamp, w/ Profile Designs T2 aero bars
FSA MegaExo, integrated exterior cartridge bearings, alloy
Mavic Ksyrium Elite, 18 hole, Mavic QR
Mavic Ksyrium Elite, 20 hole, Mavic QR
Body Geometry Toup√© Team, superlight foam, carbon reinforced base, microfiber cover
Specialized Transition carbon w/ Speed Zertz
Chain stay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
